input_data.title: Citadel
input_data.overview: What if you lost your memory? What if a spy didn’t know they were a spy? Years ago, the top agents of Citadel, Mason Kane and Nadia Sinh, had their minds wiped. But, they’re called back to action as sinister forces emerge from the past. With the help of spymaster Bernard Orlick, these former lovers must remember the past to save the future.

response.analytical_summary: Citadel is a high-octane spy thriller centered on two former elite agents, Mason Kane and Nadia Sinh, who have had their memories erased. Years later, they are reactivated to confront a shadowy organization linked to their past. The series blends action, intrigue, and a focus on identity and memory, exploring themes of loyalty, betrayal, and the manipulation of individuals for political gain. It promises a globe-trotting adventure with complex characters and a focus on the psychological toll of espionage.
response.spoiler_rich_plot_summary: The series begins with Mason Kane and Nadia Sinh living seemingly ordinary lives, unaware of their past as top agents for Citadel, a global intelligence agency. Their memories were wiped years prior as part of a contingency plan to protect them from a devastating attack orchestrated by a rival organization known as Manticore. When Manticore resurfaces, threatening global stability, Mason and Nadia are abruptly pulled back into the world of espionage. Guided by spymaster Bernard Orlick, they begin to piece together fragments of their forgotten past, uncovering a web of deception and betrayal within Citadel itself. As they confront their former colleagues and enemies, they discover that their memories were not merely erased but carefully manipulated to serve a larger agenda. The series follows their journey as they attempt to restore their identities, expose Manticore's plans, and ultimately confront the forces that sought to control them, all while grappling with the emotional and psychological consequences of their past lives.
response.keyword_sentence: Citadel is a suspenseful spy thriller set across global locations, exploring themes of memory loss and identity crisis as skilled spies confront betrayal and international intrigue.
